mapper.select: SELECT no, title, writer, writeDate, hit FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, no, title, writer, writeDate, hit FROM( SELECT no, title, writer, writeDate, hit FROM board ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 and 10
SELECT no, title, content, writer, writeDate, hit FROM board WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: INSERT INTO board (no, title, content, writer, pw) VALUES (board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{pw})
